description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use physics to swing your wrecking ball into enemies. Cause mayhem and destruction by making enemies collide with each other, the walls,  and even into your base. Featuring 20 levels of smashing plus an infinite mode where you test your skill amidst an endless swarm of enemies.
description.short: Use physics to swing your wrecking ball into enemies. Cause mayhem and destruction by making enemies collide with each other, the walls,  and even into your base. Featuring 20 levels of smashing plus an infinite mode where you test your skill amidst an endless swarm of enemies.
